title: *ALERT: serious Microsoft bug!! *
body: <!-- id=102--><!-- isMature=0 -->Open <A HREF="http://diesel.ath.cx/hackyoass/vulnerable2k.html" target="_blank">this link</A>[NT,2000,XP] or <A HREF="http://diesel.ath.cx/hackyoass/vulnerable98.html" target="_blank">this link</A>[95,98,Me] in internet explorer to test for the vulnerability.  If you get a command prompt or minesweeper, then you must change your security settings, otherwise people could potentially format your hard drive or run other destructive programs/scripts.
bodyArticleHtml:
2002-11-19

*ALERT: serious Microsoft bug!! *

Open
